Beach + Potassium = K
Earth + Vase = Pot
Dust + Fire = Ash
K + Phoenix = Fire
Dust + Dust = Sand
Glass + Pot = Vase
Kite + Water = Wind
Earth + Wind = Dust
K + Planet = Earth
Fire + Sand = Glass
Puddle + Vase = Water
Sand + Water = Beach
Ash + Pot = Potash
K + Potash = Potassium  // 14



Gen 1 - 50 Elements -> 50 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 161 Elements -> 211 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 555 Elements -> 766 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 1764 Elements -> 2530 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 5310 Elements -> 7840 Total Elements
Gen 6 - NaN Elements -> NaN Total Elements

K + KCl = K2cl
K2cl + KCl = K4cl
K4cl + KCl = K4cl2

5 - K3cl3: 
Potash + Water = Salt
K + Salt = KCl
K + KCl = K2cl
K2cl + K2cl = K2cl2
K2cl2 + KCl = K3cl3

5 - Hydrokick: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Kickassium + Potash = Ass Kicking
Ass Kicking + Water = Hydrokick

5 - K4o16: 
K + Potassium = K2O
K2O + K2O = K2o2
K2O + K2o2 = K4o4
K4o4 + K4o4 = K4o8
K4o8 + K4o8 = K4o16

5 - K28beach: 
K + K = K2
K2 + Potassium = K4
K4 + K4 = K8
Beach + K8 = K8beach
K2 + K8beach = K28beach

6 - Kickass King: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Glass + Kickassium = Kickass Glass
K + Kickass Glass = Kickass Glasses
K + Kickass Glasses = Kickass King

5 - Kickass Vase: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Glass + Kickassium = Kickass Glass
Kickass Glass + Vase = Kickass Vase

5 - K12beach: 
K + K = K2
K2 + Potassium = K4
K4 + K4 = K8
Beach + K8 = K8beach
K4 + K8beach = K12beach

6 - Potassiumkick: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Kickassium + Potash = Ass Kicking
Ass Kicking + Water = Hydrokick
Hydrokick + Potassium = Potassiumkick

5 - Sand Kicking: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Kickassium + Potash = Ass Kicking
Ass Kicking + Sand = Sand Kicking

6 - Kash Pot: 
Glass + Wind = Window
K + Window = K-Window
Ash + K-Window = K-ash
K-ash + K-Window = K-ash Window
K + K-ash Window = Kash Window
Kash Window + Potassium = Kash Pot

5 - K-ash Vase: 
Glass + Wind = Window
K + Window = K-Window
Ash + K-Window = K-ash
K-ash + K-Window = K-ash Window
K-ash Window + Vase = K-ash Vase

6 - Potassium41: 
K + Potassium = K2O
K2O + K2O = K2o2
K2O + K2o2 = K4o4
K4o4 + K4o4 = K4o8
K4o8 + Potassium = Potassium40
K + Potassium40 = Potassium41

5 - Ashbeach: 
K + K = K2
K2 + Potassium = K4
K4 + K4 = K8
Beach + K8 = K8beach
Ash + K8beach = Ashbeach

6 - Potassium Kickassium: 
Dust + K = Kick
K + Kick = Karate
Karate + Potassium = Kickassium
Kickassium + Potash = Ass Kicking
Ass Kicking + Potassium = Potassium Kicker
Potassium + Potassium Kicker = Potassium Kickassium
